price: 141. Waa si uu Alle u daahiriyo kuwa (Xaqa) rumeysan oo u baabbi’iyo gaalada.
arabic: وَلِيُمَحِّصَ ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَيَمۡحَقَ ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: waliyumaḥḥiṣa al-lahu alladhīna āmanū wayamḥaqa al-kāfirīna
